title: SP5 "Episode of Nami: Tears of a Navigator and the Bonds of Friends"[4]Transliteration: "Episōdo obu Nami: Kōkaishi no Namida to Nakama no Kizuna" (Japanese:エピソードオブナミ ～航海士の涙と仲間の絆～) Katsumi Tokoro Hirohiko Kamisaka August 25, 2012(2012-08-25) 106 minutes
transformers_text: SP 5 Episode of Nami Tears of a Navigator and the Bonds of Friends 4 Transliteration Ep is do o bu Nami K kai shi no N amida to Na kama no Ki zun a Japanese Katsumi To koro Hiro hi ko Kami saka August 25 2012 2012 08 25 106 minutes An abridged remake of the Ar long Park story arc n 2 Some time after joining the Straw Hats Nami steals the Going Merry and returns to her home in Coco yash i Village which is under the control of the Ar long Pirates When Us opp finds Nami Ar long orders her to kill him and she injures herself while faking Us opp's death Once the Straw Hats regroup Nami's sister No ji ko aware of the bond they had explains that when Ar long took control of the village he murdered Nami's mother and held Coco yash i's citizens as ransom to exploit Nami's exceptional talent for cartography After Ar long in forms Nez umi a bribed Marine of where Nami's earnings are hidden the village riots against Ar long despite poor odds After Nami tearfully asks Luffy for help he and the remaining Straw Hats free the village by fighting and defeating the Ar long Pirates After a days long celebration Nami re joins the Straw Hat crew
